body_html:
Yes; the check should be:

all(isinstance(x, (ops.Tensor, ops.IndexedSlices)) for x in inputs

note you'll also have to change the n=1 case to return the IndexedSlices values through an identity, instead of calling identity() on the entire object.

Would you like to submit a PR doing this?
body_text:
Yes; the check should be:
all(isinstance(x, (ops.Tensor, ops.IndexedSlices)) for x in inputs
note you'll also have to change the n=1 case to return the IndexedSlices values through an identity, instead of calling identity() on the entire object.
Would you like to submit a PR doing this?
body:
Yes; the check should be:

```python
all(isinstance(x, (ops.Tensor, ops.IndexedSlices)) for x in inputs
```

note you'll also have to change the n=1 case to return the IndexedSlices values through an identity, instead of calling identity() on the entire object.

Would you like to submit a PR doing this?
